name: Space Invaders Extreme [NDS]
description: <br/>The critically acclaimed update to the Space Invaders franchise is here to invade Steam with greatly improved graphics and audio!<br/>Packed with pulsing, vibrant visuals enhanced further by interactive sound. The invaders have evolved, the question is: can you keep up?<br/>The Steam version adds a brand new World Ranking System for Arcade Mode. Learn the intricacies of the scoring system and use that knowledge to conquer the leaderboards!<br/>Who will prevail in this battle to become the world champion?!<br/><br/><br/><br/><br/><br/><strong>Key Points</strong><br/><ul><li>16 stages brimming with devious invader attack patterns and bosses whose strategy adapts according to the game difficulty!<br/></li><li>Practice individual stages in Free Play, then go up against your rivals score in Arcade Mode!<br/></li><li>Discover all the countless, hidden bonuses and boost your score to new heights!<br/></li><li>Experience immersion through interactive sound with synchronized visuals. Welcome to the new invasion!</li></ul><br/><strong>Sound Track:</strong><br/>1 ExtrEmE (MENU)<br/>2 invAde yOu (Stage1) <br/>3 Outbreak (Stage2) <br/>4 Regress (Stage3A) <br/>5 Progress (Stage3B)<br/>6 Gradation (Stage4A)<br/>7 Harum (Stage4B) <br/>8 Shatter (Stage4C)<br/>9 rEpulse mE (Stage5A)<br/>10 Rave Lovers from Outer Space - Yu Shimoda/Zuntata (Stage5B) <strong>NEW!</strong><br/>11 Future Extreme 20XX - Cosio (Stage5C) <strong>NEW!</strong><br/>12 Zero Hour (Stage5D) <br/>13 intEnal (RESULT) <strong>NEW!</strong><br/>14 Congratulations - Shohei Tsuchiya/Zuntata (ENDING) <strong>NEW!</strong><br/>
